name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SplitShare - Split and share video range.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Would you like to share custom range of video? Just choose start, end times and share url with friends!
